transactions.title: Participation Fee Transactions
transactions.description: Details of any transactions relating to fees exchanged for this bid.

ValueBreakdown.title: Value Breakdown
ValueBreakdown.description: Information on a single value of importance with the option to specify the net and gross values along with any taxes or discounts applied.

id.title: Value Identifier
id.description: A locally unique identifier for this Value Breakdown. Used to track changes to this value breakdown and to [merge](https://standard.open-contracting.org/latest/en/schema/merging/#merging) multiple releases to create a record.

description.title: Value Breakdown Description
description.description: A short description of the amount, including any reasoning where necessary.

rate.title: Rate Applied
rate.description: In the case of a proportional tax or discount, this displays the rate given as a decimal.

value.title: Value Breakdown Amount
value.description: The amount covered in this value breakdown.

valueBreakdown.title: Value Breakdown
valueBreakdown.description: The breakdown of the value covered in this item, with the option of including the gross and net value alongside any taxes or discounts applied.

CodeBreakdown.title: Code Breakdown
CodeBreakdown.description: An ID and description of a code scheme, that might not have a publicly available schema or be used across different publishers.

id.title: Code Breakdown ID
id.description: The identifier to represent this breakdown.

description.title: Code Breakdown Description.
description.description: A textual description or title for the given code.

Person.title: Person Details
Person.description: Name and ID of an invovled person, and a linked organization ref where it exists.

id.title: Person ID
id.description: The identifier to represent this person.

name.title: Person Name.
name.description: The full name of the person described.

organization.title: Related Organization
organization.description: The organization with which this person is associated.

paymentMethod.title: Payment Method
paymentMethod.description: Mechanism for completing payment, for example BACS or Purchase card.

description.title: Transaction description
description.description: An string covering details for this transaction.

invoiceReceiptDate.title: Invoice Receipt Date
invoiceReceiptDate.description: The date on which the invoice was received.

paymentDueDate.title: Payment Due Date
paymentDueDate.description: The date on which this payment is due.

paymentApprovalDate.title: Payment Approval Date
paymentApprovalDate.description: The date on which this payment is approved.

paymentExecutedDate.title: Payment Execution Date
paymentExecutedDate.description: The date on which this payment is executed.

valueBreakdown.title: Value Breakdown
valueBreakdown.description: A breakdown of the net and gross value, including details of any tax or discount applied. A discount is indicated by a negative amount.

executor.title: Payment executor
executor.description: The name of the person who executed the payment of this transaction

authorizers.title: Payment Authorizers
authorizers.description: An array of details of people involved in the authorization of this payment.

budgetCode.title: Budget Code
budgetCode.description: Reference code for the budget of this transaction.

accountCode.title: Account Code
accountCode.description: Code linking the payment to the Accounts Payable code.

classification.title: Transaction Classification
classification.description: A classification of category associated with items covered in this transaction, such as CPV codes..

relatedLineItems.title: Related Line Items
relatedLineItems.description: Identifiers of items detailed in the `Items` class which are covered by this transaction.

relatedDocuments.title: Related Documents
relatedDocuments.description: Identifiers of any items in the `Documents` array which are related to this transaction.
